did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: US Congressional Investigation of Teachers' Union Local No. 555, United Public Workers of America, CIO, 1948
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Transcript of the hearings of the investigation of United Public Workers of America, Teachers Union Local No. 555.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Investigation of Teachers Union Local No. 555, UPWA-CIO : hearings before the United States House Committee on Education and Labor, Special Subcommittee To Investigate Teachers Union, Local No. 555, United Public Workers of America, CIO, Eightieth Congress, second session, on Sept. 27-30, Oct. 1, 19, 1948.
Hearings were held in New York City.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Investigation of Teachers Union Local No. 555, UPWA-CIO : hearings before the United States House Committee on Education and Labor, Special Subcommittee To Investigate Teachers Union, Local No. 555, United Public Workers of America, CIO, Eightieth Congress, second session, on Sept. 27-30, Oct. 1, 19, 1948.
